title: Wild, Wicked, And Haunted In Hollywood
description: From hell to a haunted ménage, can a macho demon slayer handle the supernatural heat?Demon hunter Paul Dean is ready for a change, but on the same night he kills his last demon, he encounters a randy ghost, and he’s not sure he’s on the right career path. During a routine sweep of the neighborhood after paranormal activity, Paul lands in the middle of a ménage where one of the participants is otherworldly and the other is out of this world.Nick Zander had given up on life until a handsome demon hunter shows up at his door. The demon hunter’s a kindred spirit. How often would a perfect stranger get naked and fall asleep in the living room? It may be the strangest beginning to a relationship in Hollywood, but it’s perfect for Nick. Until the demon hunter reveals Nick’s dreams are not imaginings, but paranormal trysts with a ghost—a specter who insists on making a supernatural ménage...
author: Lee Avalone
